TopicTitle: [0.90][RSS]Crafts moving on the surface crashed into it

Articles.Content:
I'm in China so i'm sorry I cannot upload file to dropbox or mediafire or google drive because the Goverment blocked it......

I'm playing KSP with RSS MOD,no ATM installed(instead I run the game on force-openGL mod).The RSS planet texture is 2048*2048.

And here is the problem:ANY CRAFT moving on the surface will crash into surface when it reaches a certain speed.When I say "crash",I mean the surface under the craft just gone(while it still looks like a ground),and the craft went down in to the surface and--BOOM!The speed of the craft when it crashes is different on different body,on kerbin(Earth),it's about 100m/s,on mun(moon),20/s or so;.;

Thanks for check this problem out!
This is a known issue with full-scale RSS, unfortunately. It seems to be a limitation of floating point precision, so it's not solvable at the moment.
